keepYourChildSafe.title: Keep Your Child Safe
keepYourChildSafe.point1: It is strongly recommended that you follow local guidelines for COVID-19 while helping your child stay as active as possible both indoors and outdoors.
keepYourChildSafe.point2: Ask your local support team or intervention centres about special arrangementsfor the COVID-19.
keepYourChildSafe.point3: Keep emergency contact numbers where you can easily see it, such as on the refrigerator.
